name: package-tracker
title: Parcel Tracker - 17track
description: A Raycast extension that allows you to track your packages using 17track's REST API.  All supported agencies are those of 17track.
author: cojmeister

commands.name: trackParcel
commands.title: Track Parcel
commands.subtitle: 17track
commands.description: Returns a package's last location - event

preferences.name: apiKey
preferences.title: 17Track API Token
preferences.description: Your 17track API Key - get one at 17Track.com

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
